metadata.title: CVE-2013-7341 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Flowplayer Flashbefore 3.2.17, as used in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.9, 2.5.xbefore 2.5.5, and 2.6.x before 2.6.2, allow remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML by (1) providing a crafted playerId or (2)referencing an external domain, a related issue to CVE-2013-7342.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
